name: Royalton Splash Riviera Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort
address: Carretera Federal 307 Tulum-Cancun Km 332, 150, Municipio de Benito Juarez, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Dreams Vista Cancun Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote I-03 Manzana 12 Supermanzana 84, 77520 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Dreams Vista Cancun is an all-new, all ocean view, family resort! Set beachfront along the Caribbean Sea, there’s activities for the kid in everyone—a beautiful beach, four pools and watersports galore. The resort’s prime location is close to the wonders and ruins of the Mayan Riviera, and right next door to the Puerto Cancun Golf Club The brand new, modern rooms and suites at Dreams Vista Cancun all offer ocean views from a private, furnished balcony or terrace, an in-room mini-bar and more. Connecting rooms, family suites, and Sun Club upgrades are also available. All rooms and suites are non-smoking.WebBeds

name: Grand Palladium Costa Mujeres Resort & Spa
address: Vialidad Paseo Mujeres, Manzana 1, Lote 10, SM 3, Cancun, Mexico, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: A sauna, an outdoor pool and 5-star accommodation are on offer at Grand Palladium Costa Mujeres Resort & Spa. It provides a gym, as well as massage services, a kids club and a playground. Rooms at Grand Palladium Costa Mujeres Resort & Spa are comfortable and provide a mini bar. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Breakfast is available each morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. Cancun International Airport is a 55-minute drive from Grand Palladium Costa Mujeres Resort & Spa. The resort's multilingual staff will ensure that every guest has an enjoyable stay.HotelsCombined

name: The Westin Lagunamar Ocean Resort Villas & Spa, Cancun
address: Km 12.5 Boulevard Kukulcan, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Find the perfect getaway at The Westin Lagunamar Ocean Resort Villas & Spa, Cancun in Mexico. Situated on the Caribbean Sea in the Cancun Hotel Zone, the studio and villa rentals at our beachfront vacation ownership resort boast endless amenities designed to make your stay exceptional. Explore popular Cancun attractions such as Tulum, Chichén Itza and more from our resort. Go for a swim in our infinity pool, spend the day on our white-sand beach, indulge at our spa or play a round of kid-friendly mini golf. Satisfy your vacation cravings at our resort restaurants or relax poolside and let us bring snacks and drinks right to you. If you've come to Mexico for a wedding, let our team make planning your event a success in an outdoor space on the beach and with our custom catering services. At the end of the day, settle into your Cancun vacation rental featuring a fully equipped kitchen and a balcony with ocean views. We look forward to welcoming you to our family-friendly Cancun beach resort in Mexico.Marriott

name: Fiesta Americana Condesa Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulkan Km 16.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun's hotel zone, next to one of the city's most beautiful beaches, this property offers enjoyable facilities and luxurious spa services with great views of Nichupte Lagoon. The family-friendly resort of Fiesta Americana Condesa Cancun consists of 3 main buildings, each sheltered by a palapa. Go swimming in the outdoor pool or spend the day at the beach. The hotel offers several eating options, including Argentinian dishes in San Telmo, Trattoria and Pizzeria offering typical Italian classics, Sushi Corner, Cantina offering the Mexican flavour, The Grill to enjoy your meals while also enjoying the outdoor view, a children's option at the Pirate Ship and for the adults La Cevichería, where they can snack and sip a refreshing beverage while watching their kids play. The Deli & Gift Shop is a relaxing corner where guests can enjoy a cup of coffee, a pastry and a good book. The Fiesta Americana's Miiluma Spa offers massage and beauty treatments. There is also a modern gym, and yoga classes are offered.

name: Altitude by Krystal Grand Punta Cancun All Inclusi
address: Boulevard Kukulcan km 8.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: The Westin Resort & Spa, Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan KM 20, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Visit paradise at The Westin Resort & Spa, Cancun. Nestled on the beach between the Caribbean Sea and a tranquil lagoon, our Cancun beach resort offers the perfect destination for business trips and vacations in Mexico. Just six miles from CUN Airport, our Cancun Quintana Roo resort is a short ride to the aquarium, museums, waterparks, Isla Mujeres and water activities. Unwind at one of our sparkling pools or on the white-sand beaches then schedule a relaxing beauty treatment at The Heavenly Spa. Find adventure with a snorkeling trip to the coral reef or other activities. Savor delicious cuisine and libations at our on-site restaurants and bars. If you're in Mexico for a conference or family gathering, take advantage of our indoor venues, custom catering, planning services and event spaces. Kick back in a comfortable guest room or suite with views of the water. All rooms include Westin Heavenly® Beds and free Wi-Fi. Best of all, our Cancun property does not charge resort or per-person fees.Marriott

name: Marriott Cancun Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulcan, Retorno Chac L-41, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Surrounded by the Caribbean Sea and situated directly on the beach, this elegant hotel offers luxurious accommodation and amenities including a spa and outdoor pool. Marriot Cancun Resort offers guests spacious rooms, private balconies and flat-screen TVs. Guests can also enjoy cuisine dishes in one of the hotel's 8 gourmet restaurants including Mikado Japanese Teppan Yaki and Sasi Thai. A variety of children's programs and a playground are offered. Marriot Cancun Resort features numerous water recreational activities and an on-site tour desk.

name: Planet Hollywood Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort
address: Crta a Punta Sam, SM006 Mza 002 Lote 07-08 Costera Zona Continental, Municipio de Isla Mujeres, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: We’ve created the ultimate beachfront vacation locale featuring Hollywood memorabilia, themed experiences, a star-worthy spa, and a variety of all-inclusive dining venues and bars, transforming the everyday all-inclusive vacation into a PHabulous getaway. From the imaginative and immersive programs offered at the Stars Kids Club to a new world of flavors offered at themed restaurants and pumped-up PHit fitness program, Planet Hollywood Cancun, An Autograph Collection All-Inclusive Resort brings big-screen excitement to the beautiful beachfront of Costa Mujeres, Cancun.Marriott

name: JW Marriott Cancun Resort & Spa
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Km 14.5, Lote 40-A, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Indulge in a revitalizing retreat at one of the best Cancun luxury resorts JW Marriott Cancun Resort & Spa, where you'll discover numerous upscale amenities including spacious, sand-toned accommodations, on-site dining and premier access to alluring destinations. Dedicate a day to exploring the historical Mayan ruins and experience the area's lively clubs and bars, dancing your nights away. Watch the sunrise over the blue Mexican Caribbean Sea, unwind with a dip in the infinity pool, retreat to a beachfront Bali daybed or pursue a little wellness at the world-class Mayan-inspired spa Sens-yah. JW Marriott Cancun Resort & Spa offers five international restaurants Sasi Thai, Gustino Italian Grill, Bella Candela, Bravio Spanish Cuisine & La 16 Mexican cuisine. The only thing left to do is toast to it all with creative craft cocktails offerings from the JW Lobby Bar’s 150 Margaritas Menu and delight exquisite shareable plates at Bella Candela. Check out our Cancun resort deals today.Marriott

name: Krystal Grand Punta Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan km 8.5, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun (Zona Hotelera), Krystal Grand Cancún is within a 10-minute walk of Cancun Convention Center and Chac Mool Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. This resort has 6 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Ocean Coral & Turquesa
address: Super Manzana 12, Lote 1-05, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Special check-in instructions Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Know Before You Go Reservations are required for massage services and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the property prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. A fee for a mandatory Christmas Eve gala dinner is included in the total price displayed for stays on December 24. A fee for a mandatory New Year's Eve gala dinner is included in the total price displayed for stays on December 31. Children 2 years old and younger stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding. Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms. No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. Disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer. Fees Late check-out is available for a fee (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.Ticket Package

name: Krystal Cancun
address: Paseo Kukulcan Km 9 Lotes 9 y 9 A, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This resort is on the ocean and across from the Cancun Convention Center. It features a sauna, hot tub, an oceanfront pool, while rooms include a minibar and cable TV. Each room at Krystal Cancun provides air conditioning. A safety deposit box is available in every room. The Krystal offers on-site car rental services. Other services include event organization, laundry facilities and a tour desk. Hacienda El Mortero restaurant is on-site at Cancun Krystal. It provides traditional Mexican cuisine and live mariachi music. The resort also offers a buffet breakfast and on-site bars. Only a short walk from the Krystal Cancun are numerous shops and restaurants. Guests at the resort will also find easy access to a variety of recreational activities including snorkeling, sailing and fishing.

name: Wyndham Garden Cancun Downtown
address: Av. Tulum Sm. 4 Mza. 14 Lote 2, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Wyndham Garden Cancun Downtown is located in the heart of downtown Cancun and very close to the world class entertainment, dining, and the beautiful white sand beaches of the Caribbean Sea. Whether traveling for business or pleasure, our central location makes us ideal for a family vacation, a weekend getaway or the business traveler needs. We're just steps from Malecon Americas, one of the biggest shopping malls in town, as well as banks, government offices, hospitals, pharmacies and restaurants. There are also plenty of fun activities nearby, including water sports, boating, water parks, fishing excursions, archaeological ruins, casinos, shopping outlets and golfing! Our guest rooms offer pillowtop mattresses, a microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, hairdryer, iron and board, in-room safe, 32" LCD TV with premium channels, alarm clock radio, free high speed internet and free local calls. Our hotel offers a Traditional Breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet access in all our public areas, 24-hour business center, a fully equipped fitness center, relaxing outdoor pool, room service and a Mexican Restaurant. After a day of hard work enjoy your favorite drink while watching your favorite sports game at our lobby bar. The Wyndham Garden Cancun Downtown team is focused in an excellence service. Guests are treated to warm hospitality and personal attention.Wyndham

name: Dreams Natura Riviera Cancun
address: Sm 31, Mz 03, Lote 101-21, Km 332, 77500 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located 15 minutes away from Cancun International Airport This family-friendly beachfront resort offers guests an Unlimited-Luxury® vacation, where everything is included: 24-hour access to unlimited food and beverage options, à la carte dining with no reservations, endless activities for all ages and more. Rooms and suites feature comforts including a private balcony or terrace and a fully stocked mini-bar. Opening November 2019- Inspired by the surrounding Mayan jungle, the all-new Now Natura Riviera Cancun will offer a unique Unlimited-Luxury® experience. Facing the Caribbean Sea on a white sand beach, the 556-room resort is a short 10-mile drive from the Cancun International AirportWebBeds

name: Park Royal Beach Cancun
address: Kukulcan Blvd., Km. 12.5, Lote 18, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Majestic Elegance Costa Mujeres
address: Carr. Libre 85, Punta Sam-Isla Blanca Sm 006, Mz 2 I Isla Mujeres I Mexico, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Very Important Perks!*From resort credits and upgrades to welcome gifts and freebies, you’ll enjoy exclusive perks at our VIP hotels in some of the hottest destinations when you book with JetBlue Vacations.One souvenir polo shirt2:00pm late check-out$50 Spa CreditFree hydrothermal water circuitGuaranteed dining reservation at the Bistro RestaurantAll-Inclusive 5 Star sophisticated and luxurious resort located on white sand beaches in Playa Mujeres Cancun, Majestic Elegance Costa Mujeres is the destination for discerning travelers in search of a luxurious beach vacation. This resort is surrounded by the most breathtaking landscape, making it an ideal place for Caribbean lovers and first timers visiting Playa Mujeres in Mexico’s Yucatán Peninsula. This 570 room resort is more adult oriented counting with 383 dedicated to accommodate adults in the Elegance Club (Adults Only 18+) section and while catering families on the Family Section(All Ages).Playa Mujeres is known for its turquoise calm waters and white sand beaches surrounded by vegetation ideally located 20 minutes away from downtown Cancun and just a couple of minutes away from the Punta Sam Ferry Terminal for a day-trip to Isla Mujeres.The south eastern coast of Mexico enjoys tropical weather year-round. The temperatures range from 68° to 86° Fahrenheit from Oct – March and from 75° to 91° from April to Sept.* Very Important Perks! Must book between 3/1/21 - 9/30/21 and all travel must be completed between 3/1/21 - 12/18/21. 4 night minimum stay is required. 4 day advance purchase required. Free polo shirt for each adult guest per room per stay. Hydrothermal water circuit is for one use per person, per stay. One guaranteed dining reservation at the Bistro Restaurant per room, per stay. Applicable on ALL room categories. Inventory availability issued by property. Offer subject to availability and may change without notice; valid for new bookings only. Additional restrictions apply. See bottom of page for JetBlue Vacations Terms and Conditions.jetBlue

name: Dreams Sapphire Resort & Spa
address: Super Manzana 11, Manzana 9, Lote 10, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This outstanding award-winning resort has a privileged location, situated on a wonderful landscape and offering a spectacular view of the Caribbean Sea. The property is set in Puerto Morelos, a famous fishing village located at only 35km from Cancun, where visitors can find multiple leisure options such as exciting excursions and water activities as well as a wide range of restaurants and cafes. This hotel offers a world of luxury to its guests with spacious and elegant rooms equipped with a private balcony or a terrace and a complimentary mini-bar refreshed daily with soft drinks and bottled water. Travellers will find unlimited activities for their entertainment as well as a spa offering the most advanced treatments. Guests can choose between six different restaurants offering a huge variety of international cuisine and various bars and lounges where they can taste a delicious cocktail.FarePortal

name: Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun, Gourmet All Inclusive by Karisma
address: Carretera Cancun Puerto Morelos km 27.5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Puerto Morelos on Bahia Petempich Beach, this 5-star resort features a renowned Gourmet Inclusive service, contemporary Caribbean-style suites, all of them including a hot tub, plus a full-service spa. It also boasts 3 outdoor pools. Every suite at the Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun offers a canopy bed, air conditioning and a balcony overlooking the ocean or gardens. The minibar is stocked daily, plus a coffee maker is included. The elegant bathrooms provide deluxe bathrobes, rain showers, marbled double sinks and a hairdryer. The Gourmet Inclusive service includes 6 different restaurants and bars. The casual-elegant restaurants offer author cuisine, which features unique courses designed by a renowned chef; world cuisine, Italian, Caribbean, Mexican. The bars include a place specialized in mojitos, cantina-style venues and a lounge serving international drinks. Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun also offers meeting and banquet facilities that can host up to 200 guests are also part of this resort's facilities. The 13,000-square-foot Vassa Spa and health club provides a fully-equipped gym and 18-foot rock climbing tower. A variety of classes are available at the resort including cooking, dancing and yoga.

name: Bahia Principe Grand Tulum
address: Crta Chetumal - Cancun Km 250, 77760 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, free WiFi access, and a spa, Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive is located in Akumal, Mexico. A flat-screen satellite TV, telephone, and alarm clock are included in each room. A minibar, refrigerator, and coffee machine are also furnished. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided in all private bathrooms. A tennis court and fitness centre are featured at the Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive as well as 9 bars and 4 restaurants. A waterpark, nightclub, and adjacent casino are also available for guests to enjoy. Aktun Chen Natural Park is 4.4 km from the hotel, Xcacel Beach is 9.7 km away, and Xel-Há Park is 11 minutes' drive away from the Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive.

name: Bahia Principe Luxury Akumal
address: Carretera Chetumal Benito Juarez KM 250, 77719 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: This exclusive beach hotel is located amidst tropical vegetation and beside a kilometre-long untouched sandy beach of the Mayan Riviera with a protective coral reef. the center of Akumal is about 3.5 km away offering a range of shops and entertainment. The turist area of Tulum is about 15 km. Playa del Carmen is 35 km away. Cancún Airport is 60 min away. Both Xel-ha and Xcaret theme parks are 15 km or within around half an hour of the hotel. Car rental is available nearby.WebBeds

name: Bahia Principe Grand Coba
address: Carretera Chetumal - Cancun Km 250, Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: This exclusive beach hotel is located amidst tropical vegetation and besides a 1 km long untouched sandy beach of the Mayan Riviera with a protective coral reef. The center of Akumal is some 3.5 km away and offers a range of shops and numerous restaurants, bars, cafes, and other entertainment venues. The toursitic zone of Tulum is 15 km from the hotel. Playa del Carmen is 35 min away and Cancún Airport is 60 min away. Xel-ha and Xcaret theme parks are 15 - 30 min of the hotel. Car rental is available nearby.WebBeds

name: Hotel Casa Blanca
address: Lafragua No. 7, 06030 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Experience relaxing facilities and delicious dining options at this hotel, situated in the financial and cultural district of Mexico City. It is just steps from the famous Reforma Avenue and 10 minutes' walk from Zócalo Square and the Cathedral. Hotel Casa Blanca features an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Guests will also appreciate the hotel's helpful concierge services for information on a variety of attractions and activities. Seibal restaurant at the Casa Blanca serves international cuisine both buffet-style and a la carte for breakfast and lunch. For traditional Mexican dishes with an extensive selection of wines and tequilas for lunch and dinner, guests can visit the Talavera Restaurant. After dinner, guests can relax and drink a cocktail in the Sports Bar located in the lobby bar or enjoy the view of the city.

name: Baruk Guadalajara Hotel de Autor
address: Lazaro Cardenas 3447, 44500 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Baruk Guadalajara Hotel de Autor, a unique and exclusive hotel concept. Located in the traditional Chapalita neighborhood, 1.6 km from the Expo Guadalajara site, very close to La Gran Plaza Fashion Mall. The Guadalajara airport is only 22 km away and the historic city center is 6 km away. The spacious rooms and suites have a modern and avant-garde style of 40m2, with a "keyless" system, high-speed internet, and special amenities such as coffee capsules. The hotel offers a Restaurant & bar with Mediterranean cuisine, coffee shop and room service. As well as an exclusive Spa, gym, deck with sundeck and resting tub. The hotel has 3 salon rooms for 40 people and a Great Hall with capacity for 500 people. Business center and Concierge service. Large parking lot for guests and visitors with charging centers for electric cars.

name: Sandos Playacar
address: Paseo Xaman-Ha, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Grand Velas Riviera Maya
address: Carretera Cancun Tulum Km 62, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Enjoy the jungles mystique and endless ocean views at this resort for all ages. Discover a different side of the Mexican Caribbean in the Zen Grand Ambiance surrounded by pristine jungle, or opt for ocean breezes in the Ambassador Ambiance. Explore the entire resort with its SE Spa and have family-friendly restaurants; adults are invited to enjoy the Grand Class Ambiances three additional restaurants and infinity pool as well. Visit the Kids Clubs and Teens Club, go on an Eco-tour, play mini.iHotelier/iStay

name: Barceló Maya Tropical
address: Ctra. Federal Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 266.3, 77750 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The beach hotel Barcelo Maya Tropical is especially popular with honeymooners and is approx. 76 km from the airport (CUN). For mobility there is a car rental company. Amenities: It is equipped with a reception, a lobby with bar, an air conditioning as well as discotheque. For the meals, there are 16 restaurants and a snack bar. In a total 15 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Room service, laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one pool. Here, there are sun loungers and sun umbrellas for free available. At the pool bar you can get refreshing beverages. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Fitness. Spa area available for a fee. Child supervision: mini club for children (from 4 - 12 years) and babysitting (for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: Visa, American Express and Euro / MasterCard. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Porto Playa Condo Hotel and Beach Club
address: 1 Avenida Norte Esquina 16 Norte Bis, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a pool, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, laundry facilities, and a freezer.Expedia

name: Wyndham Alltra Playa del Carmen Adults Only
address: Constituyentes Number 1, 77500 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Wyndham Alltra Playa del Carmen provides 4-star accommodation in Playa del Carmen. It has a spa and wellness center, as well as free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and an outdoor pool. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24/7 and can assist with booking tours and tickets. After a day of discovering the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They feature tea and coffee making facilities, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to have a meal. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and cafés in the area. Playa del Carmen's attractions, including Mexico Blue Dream and Mamitas Beach Club, are within easy walking distance of the resort. The local neighborhood is also famous for its shops and boutiques.HotelsCombined

name: The Fives Beach Hotel & Residences - All Senses Inclusive
address: Predio El Limonar Fraccion 2, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Facing the beachfront, The Fives Beach Hotel & Residences - All Senses Inclusive offers 5-star accommodation in Playa del Carmen and features a garden, terrace and restaurant. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The resort provides an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. At the resort, every room comes with a wardrobe. Each room has air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at The Fives Beach Hotel & Residences - All Senses Inclusive have a balcony. Guest rooms will provide guests with a minibar. A continental, Italian or American breakfast is available daily at the property. Around the clock guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Spanish. Playa del Carmen Beach is a few steps from the accommodation, while Mayakoba Beach is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 42 km from The Fives Beach Hotel & Residences - All Senses Inclusive, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Barcelo Maya Palace
address: Carretera Chetumal Pto Juarez Km 266.3. Riviera Maya, 77750 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Catalonia Playa Maroma
address: Carretera Federal 307 Km.306-250, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Surrounded by lush mangrove forests, on Punta Maroma Beach, this all-inclusive hotel and spa offers a wide selection of activities, free Wi-Fi and a variety of dining options. Catalonia Playa Maroma - All-Inclusive features a beachfront swimming pool with a poolside bar. Guests can play a game of tennis or workout in the fitness center, then relax with a massage in the full-service spa. While adults enjoy non-motorized water sports at the beach, the kids can have fun at the children's club. Visitors can savor everything from authentic Mexican cuisine to fresh seafood at the All-Inclusive Playa Maroma Catalonia. During the day, a variety of beverages and snacks are available to enjoy by the pool or beach. After dinner, guests can dance the night away in the nightclub.

name: Hotel Esencia
address: Carretera Cancún-Tulum Km. 265, 77750 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: Offering direct access to Xpu-Ha Beach, Hotel Esencia offers beautiful rooms and suites with terraces set amongst attractive gardens. It features a spa, 2 large outdoor swimming pools and an à la carte restaurant. All air-conditioned accommodation has bright, attractive décor. Each suite and room has a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. The Garden Restaurant serves a selection of regional and international cuisine. The hotel also offers Mexican cookery classes. The Esencia’s spa features a plunge pool, sauna and hot tub. Treatments include massage and facials. The Riviera Maya coastline is ideal for diving and snorkelling. Guests can visit the Mayan ruins at Tulum, as well as the resort of Playa del Carmen, which can be reached within 15 minutes by car.

name: Hacienda Tres Rios Resort Spa & Nature Park
address: Carretera Cancún-Tulum, Km. 54, 77760 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Barcelo Maya Caribe
address: Carretera Chetumal, 77750 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Bluebay Grand Esmeralda
address: Carr. Chetumal - Puerto Juárez Km 300, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The hotel is located on the Riviera Mayan about 15 minutes north of Playa del Carmen, with its restaurants, bars, exciting nightlife and shopping opportunities, and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport. Links to public transport can be found 15 min from the hotel. Property located on 180-acres of beachfront overlooking the azure waters of Mexico's beautiful Mayan RivieraWebBeds

name: Grand Sunset Princess
address: Prolongación 5ta Avenida Mza 20 Lote 006, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is situated on the beach, 5km from a golf course, 7km from a shopping mall and 10km from Playa del Carmen center. Facilities and services include restaurant, bar, wireless Internet in public areas, parking, gym, spa facilities (extra charge), garden, conference room, swimming pool, children's pool, elevator and 24-hour reception. The rooms feature air conditioning, TV, telephone, wireless Internet access (extra charge), minibar, safe (extra charge), bathroom, hairdryer and balcony/terrace. ** Please note that some of the above facilities may be closed due to weather / seasonal conditions. Address: Prolongacion 5ta Avenida Mza 20 Lote 006, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, Mexico.WebBeds

name: Barceló Maya Colonial
address: Ctra. Federal Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 266.3, 77750 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Mexico's beautiful Mayan Riviera is home to this exceptional beachfront resort, offering a variety of on-site activities and entertainment along with numerous dining options, spacious swimming pools and comfortable accommodations. Begin the day at the Barcelo Maya Colonial Beach with a delicious meal from one of the 7 on-site restaurants. Enjoy lounging by one of 3 swimming pools or participate in the resort's daily group activities, including horseback riding through the forest. Relax with a cocktail from one of the Maya Colonial's numerous on-site bars or take advantage of on-site diving lessons, kayak rentals or basketball courts. Finish the evening at the on-site nightclub or play a game on the resort's mini-golf course.

name: Grand Riviera Princess All Suites & Spa Resort
address: Prolongacion 5ta Avenida, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens and an extensive pool landscape, the Grand Riviera Princess has Mayan inspired architecture with thatched roofs and enjoys a wonderful setting directly on the white sandy beach and the crystal-clear waters of the Caribbean Sea. Various thematic restaurants leave no culinary wish unfulfilled, 10 bars and a wide range of services and amenities are at guests disposition.FarePortal

name: Fairmont Mayakoba
address: Carretera Federal Cancun - Playa Del Carmen Km 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: With the Caribbean Sea on one side and 240 acres of tropical forest and sparkling lagoons on all others, Fairmont Mayakoba is a hidden paradise on the coast of Mexico. Our private gated resort invites you to reconnect with nature, while enjoying all the services and facilities of an AAA Five Diamond hotel. Delve into your lush surroundings, play in the waves at nearby Playa del Carmen or relax poolside at our 5-star Riviera Maya hotel. Then dine on a decadent variety of cuisines in our restaurants.accorhotels.com

name: Ocean Riviera Paradise
address: Carretera Federal Chetumal Cancun KM 296, Predio Montecarlos Lotes 7, 7-1 y Predio Punta Bete Lote 15-5, 77511 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Sandos Caracol Eco Experience Resort
address: Carretera Cancún Chetumal Km. 295, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This property is located on the beachfront. Featuring a spa, 9 restaurants and 2 outdoor pools and an water park with 29 water slides for kids and adults, Sandos Caracol Eco Resort is set on Playa del Carmen Beach, overlooking Cozumel Island. Some of the rooms have balconies overlooking the Caribbean Sea. Sandos Caracol Eco Resort is in beautiful gardens and features bright accommodations. All rooms have flat-screen TVs, air conditioning and a minibar. Wi-Fi is available for free in public areas. Sandos Caracol Eco Resort features lessons, including yoga and scuba diving. There is also a water sports center, evening entertainment, and children's and teen's activities. Spa facilities include a sauna, hot tub and gym. There are 3 buffetes including international and itialian, plus 6 a la carte restaurants (Oriental, Mexican Brazilian, Italian, Mediterranean and stake house), we also have a 24 hour snack bar available. There are ecological activities for the whole family. The Sandos Caracol Eco Resort is 3.2 km from the Church of Guadalupe and a 45-minute drive from Cancún Airport. The Gran Coral Golf Riviera Maya is located within the same estate as the Sandos.

name: Barceló Maya Beach
address: Carr Chetumal Puerto Juarez Km 266.3, 77750 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Hacienda del Mar Los Cabos
address: Corredor Turístico Sjc-Csl, KM. 10 Lote D, Cabo Del Sol, 23455 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Experience the beauty and charm of Hacienda del Mar Los Cabos Resort, a stunning architectural masterpiece with a classic Mexican Hacienda flair. Elegant guest villas with balconies are scattered across lush, tropical gardens overlooking a private beach on the Emerald Sea of Cortez. Enjoy a seamless blend of traditional Mexican charm and contemporary style with exceptional service unlike anywhere else. Situated in the prestigious Cabo del Sol development, the resort features 270 guest rooms and suites, the restorative Cactus SPA™, a fitness center with a steam room and sauna, a variety of restaurants to choose from, evening entertainment, and sparkling pools that create an atmosphere of pure indulgence. For timeless celebrations, our planners can assist in an unforgettable beach wedding or ballroom gathering, curated in every way.Marriott

name: Esperanza, Auberge Resorts Collection
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 7, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated on the coast of the Pacific Ocean, this luxury resort is 19 km from downtown Los Cabos. It features a beachfront infinity pool, spa boutique, and free yoga sessions. Each spacious cabana-style room at the Cabo San Lucas Esperanza Resort is furnished with high ceilings and a large, private terrace. Guests can watch the flat-screen TV, use the free Wi-Fi, or charge their iPod with the iPod docking station. This resort boasts a private beach with concierge services. There is a large state-of-the-art gym and an on-site art gallery. Cocina del Mar, part of the resort, is carved into the cliffs overlooking the ocean and serves Baja-inspired cuisine. La Terraza Americana is open for lunch and offers American dishes in a casual outdoor atmosphere. The infinity pool has a swim-up bar. Cabo San Lucas International Airport is 14.2 km from Esperanza Resort Cabo San Lucas. Downtown San José del Cabo is a 25-minute drive from the property.

name: El Encanto Resort at Hacienda Encantada
address: Carr Transpeninsular KM 7.3 Suite A3, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Dreams Los Cabos Suites Golf Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Transpenisular 18.5 Cls-Sjc, 23400 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located 2.6-miles from Chileno Beach, this Los Cabos resort features a full-service spa. Three sparkling pools and yoga on the beach are offered along with ocean views from every suite. This all-suite Dream Los Cabos Suites Golf Resort & Spa features suites with a private terrace overlooking the ocean. Each suite includes a stocked minibar and iPod docking station. The marble bathrooms boast separate bathtubs and showers with slippers and bathrobes provided. On-site dining includes steaks, seafood, Pan Asian and more. Guests at Dream Los Cabos Suites Resort can also choose from a la carte items and buffets. Room service is available as well. Dream Los Cabos Suites Resort & Spa offers tennis clinics, cooking classes and cocktail lessons. A seasonal turtle release event allows guests to participate in helping the Caray Green Sea Turtles.

name: Hilton Grand Vacations Club La Pacifica Los Cabos
address: Mexico 1 Tourist Corridor, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: We are on the shore of Los Cabos between the towns of San Jose del Cabo and Cabo San Lucas. Cabo Real and El Dorado golf clubs are under 10 minutes away. Take a dip in our infinity pool or our Dolphin Terrace pool overlooking the Sea of Cortes. Indulge in massage, salon or beauty treatments at our spa.Hilton

name: Grand Velas Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 17, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Grand Velas Boutique Los Cabos is the third property of Velas Resorts on the prestigious Touristic Corridor of Los Cabos. A seventy-nine-suite adults-only luxury boutique hotel with exclusive facilities and amenities that takes the best of the Grand Velas brand and elevates it to a level never seen before.Enjoy casual and fine dining restaurants, indoor and outdoor event spaces, a wellness center, an infinity pool overlooking the Sea of Cortez, and a hyper-personalized service that will leave even the most experienced travelers speechless.iHotelier/iStay

name: Zadun-A Ritz-Carlton Reserve
address: Boulevard Mar de Cortez, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Welcome to Zadún, the first Ritz-Carlton Reserve in Mexico where an authentic and magical experience awaits you. Our resort in San José del Cabo offers an untouched sanctum where desert and ocean collide — in your very own luxurious haven. Allow yourself to be seduced by Puerto Los Cabos, its breathtaking coastline, and a rich culture that will enchant you at every breath. Discover and explore a town with a historical charm and submerged in Spanish colonial flare. A very modern design Mexico has to offer, coupled with the handcrafted work of local artisans, will lay a magical and compelling experience at your feet. With every step you take inside Zadún, you’ll be surrounded by a natural allure and elegance unlike anything you’ve ever seen. Give in to the intimacy of our San José del Cabo hotel hideaway that you can claim as your own, reserved just for you at the end of the Earth.Marriott

name: The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas
address: Carretera Transpenninsular Km 22.5, 23440 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Experience the ultimate wellness retreat in Los Cabos at The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas. Situated by the Pacific Ocean and the Sea of Cortez, our family-friendly vacation ownership resort places you steps from the picturesque beaches and seaside cliffs of Los Cabos, Mexico. Scuba dive amid underwater coral reefs at the Cabo Pulmo Marine Preserve and tee off on the rolling greens of nearby golf courses. After sightseeing at the famous Los Cabos Arch, return for a revitalizing treatment at our resort’s Spa Otomi. Our outdoor infinity pool, a 24-hour WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, tennis courts and a Westin Kids Club activate your vacation in Mexico. Fuel up at our six on-site restaurants and bars that serve a variety of international cuisine or join friends for the big game and a craft brew at our sports bar. As the sun sets on Los Cabos, settle into your comfortable studio or spacious villa accommodations with complimentary Wi-Fi. Escape to our relaxing seaside resort.Marriott

name: Solaz, A Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos
address: Km 18 5 Carretera Transpeninsular Csl-sj, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Covet is our prime location on the beach at Solaz, a Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos. Enjoy easy access from our luxury hotel to the Baja peninsula, downtown San Jose del Cabo and Marina Cabo San Lucas. Our contemporary luxury hotel in San Jose, Los Cabos features rooms and suites with an ideal respite and exquisite designs, luxury beds, marble floors and custom furnishings. Our resort's custom floor plans blur the line between indoor and outdoor spaces. Many rooms boast private entrances with secluded, furnished patios, outdoor showers, private plunge pools and unobstructed views of the beach and Sea of Cortez. Pamper yourself in San Jose del Cabo at our hotel spa after you sample our resort's diverse dining options. Stay fit in our 24-hour fitness center with help from a personal trainer. Then relax in one of two heated infinity pools while the kids enjoy our two heated children's pools. A truly blissful experience awaits you at Solaz.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Resort Los Cabos at Costa Palmas
address: Calle Hacienda Eureka, 23570 La Ribera, Baja California Sur
description: Set within the thousand-acre private resort community of Costa Palmas along the secluded East Cape of Mexico’s Baja Sur, the Four Seasons Resort Los Cabos at Costa Palmas™ is a haven of exquisite beauty and serenity. From its two-mile stretch of pristine beach and swimmable waters, to its sublime location—just 45 minutes from Los Cabos International Airport, yet far from the crowded Cabo resorts—this idyllic retreat makes for an ideal tropical luxury getaway. The Resort offers many open-air public spaces including the lobby and nearly all dining venues; its low-lying architectural footprint precludes the need for shared elevators or hallways. Natural light permeates the guest rooms and suites, which are designed by Todd-Avery Lenahan of TAL Studio. All accommodations showcase striking views of the Sea of Cortez as well as spacious private terraces; first-floor guest rooms and suites also boast private plunge pools. Choose from several exceptional dining options: Estiatorio Milos, Chef Costas Spiliadis’s famed Mediterranean seafood restaurant featuring a market-style menu of impeccable seafood; Casa de Brasa, a Baja-inspired brasserie; El Puesto, serving sea-to-table ceviche, tiraditos, and crudo; Limón, an all fresco bar and grill; and Ginger’s, an all-day eclectic café. Indulge in the Resort’s array of refined on-site amenities, including Costa Palmas Golf Club, a Robert Trent Jones II eighteen-hole golf course, a leading-edge sports and fitness facility designed by world-renowned fitness expert Harley Pasternak, six refreshing swimming pools, and a blissful Oasis spa, and wellness center featuring ten free-standing treatment sanctuaries. Let the Resort’s Adventure Concierge help you unlock the East Cape—Mexico’s best-kept secret—by arranging any number of exhilarating land and sea activities: hiking to hidden waterfalls, swimming alongside the majestic whale shark, surfing in legendary waters, snorkeling in the nearby UNESCO World Heritage site of Cabo Pulmo, sport fishing in the Sea of Cortez, off-roading through desert dunes, sailing from the Resort’s marina, horseback riding amid vibrant natural beauty, and more.

name: The Residences at Solaz, a Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos
address: Km 18 5 Carretera Transpe Cabo, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Experience the epitome of luxury living at The Residences at Solaz. With exquisite, luxurious finishes and unparalleled views these residences offer a truly elevated lifestyle. Enjoy exclusive access to world-class amenities and services including a dedicated artisan butler and concierge to ensure every need is met with impeccable attention to detail. Privacy is paramount, allowing you to enjoy the utmost in tranquility and seclusion. Indulge in the finest dining experiences with on-site restaurants where culinary delights await to tantalize your taste buds. Discover a world of incomparable luxury at The Residences at Solaz.Marriott

name: Villa del Arco Beach Resort & Spa
address: Camino Viejo a San José Km 0.4, El Medano Ejidal, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas on El Médano Beach, this hotel features spacious suites with kitchenette facilities. A 3-level health spa is available along with a sailing facility and restaurants. Each suite at Villa del Arco Cabo San Lucas includes a living area and large bathroom. The kitchenettes are equipped with a stovetop, refrigerator, and microwave. Guests can enjoy the sauna and the swimming pool. Cabo San Lucas Villa del Arco also provides a mini-market, scuba diving facility, and tennis courts. San José del Cabo is 20 miles from Villa del Arco. Sports fishing and whale watching are nearby.

name: JW Marriott Los Cabos Beach Resort & Spa
address: Fraccion Hotelera FH5-C1, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Experience the essence of tropical luxury at JW Marriott Los Cabos Beach Resort & Spa. Positioned along the picturesque beachfront of San Jose del Cabo, where the Sea of Cortez meets the Pacific Ocean, our luxury hotel offers an ideal setting to bask in the sun with a touch of sophistication. Whether you're beachcombing, lounging by our pristine pools or perfecting your golf game on our 27-hole course, unwinding from daily life is effortless. Seeking respite from the Los Cabos sun? Indulge in the tropical serenity of our luxurious Jasha Spa & Salon. Our resort is also home to six distinctive dining venues and bars, perfect for savoring moments from dawn till dusk. When it's time to retreat for the night, find solace in our chic hotel rooms and suites. Adorned with luxury furnishings and inspiring ocean vistas, our accommodations elevate your vacation experience. Whether you're seeking solitude, joining us for a family trip or rekindling romance, create lasting memories at our Los Cabos resort.Marriott

name: Suites at PB Rose' Resort and Spa Cabo San Lucas
address: Playa El Medano Apartado Postal 460, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Offering a private beach and an outdoor pool, this 5-star resort is located in Los Cabos. It also has a gym, a beauty centre and a sauna. Suites at Rose Resort and Spa Cabo San Lucas's room features a dishwasher, a refrigerator and a microwave. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning at the resort, and there are numerous restaurants and cafés nearby. Packed lunches are available on request for those with day trips planned. Suites at Rose Resort and Spa Cabo San Lucas is situated in the popular tourist destination of El Medano. Playa Las Viudas is just an easy car ride from the resort.HotelsCombined

name: Suites at VDP Cabo San Lucas Beach Resort and Spa
address: Camino Viejo a San Jose, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: The beachfront Suites at Villa Del Palmar Beach Resort and Spa features an outdoor lagoon-style pool with a waterfall, a whale slide, and a full-service spa. Cabo San Lucas city center is 1.5 mi away. In addition to a sea view, these suite offers WiFi and a full kitchen or kitchenette. The Suites at Villa Del Palmar Beach Resort extras include a seating area, flat-screen satellite TV, and a bathroom with a bath or shower. The Market is open all day, the Taco Bar serves Mexican food during the day, Bella California serves classic Italian cuisine for dinner, and Los Tortugas offers dinner shows and a buffet each night. Packed lunches are offered at Palmita Deli & Market. Also available is an optional all inclusive program which covers all meals and drinks during your stay. When guests tire of relaxing by Bahia San Lucas, shopping is only 6 minutes’ drive away at Puerto Paraiso Mall. The resort is also within 1.2 mi of Marina Cabo San Lucas and Cabo San Lucas Country Club.Official Hotel Information

name: Suites at Hacienda Del Mar Resort Los Cabos
address: KM 10 Lot "D" Local "D" Cabo del Sol, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Hacienda Del Mar Los Cabos Resort Junior Suite with One Bathroom, Kitchenette, and balcony- sleeps 4. Available for a one week stay, with Saturday or Monday check in only. This unit has an ocean view, garden view, or mountain view. Rooms are assigned at check in, and you will have input on location based on availability. There is a minimum and maximum of 7 nights. There are no resort fees. This magnificent property is located in the mystical desert landscape of the Baja Peninsula. Surrounding the property are golf courses that will challenge any handicap, or you can explore the peninsula, known for its beauty and endless photographic opportunities. If you're accustomed to living, sleeping and waking in the lap of luxury, then you should identify with our accommodations, all set in low rise villas, each tasteful, spacious and offering you a choice of ocean front locations, as well as ocean, garden and golf views. -Surrounded by Jack Nicklaus Signature Ocean Golf Course known as the Pebble Beach of Baja at Cabo del Sol. -Infinity swimming pools, with water falls and countless fountains. -Private beaches, European Style SPA and fitness center with state of the art equipment and personal trainers. -Beauty Salon -Fashion Boutique -' Los Portales ', Mini-Deli -Business Center. -24-hour Room Service -Safe deposit boxes in room & Suites -24-hour cable television -Laundry and dry cleaning -24-hour medical service -Ground transportation -Car rental -Long distance phone calls and fax machines. -Free private parking. Further Details -$4 per day service fee paid directly to the property. (subject to change) -WiFi is included at no chargeVRBO

name: Villa La Valencia Beach Resort & Spa Los Cabos
address: Km.18.5 Carretera Transpeninsular San José-San Lucas, Col. Lomas del tule, San José del Cabo, México. B.C.S., 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Located in San José del Cabo, 600 metres from Boca del Tule Beach, Villa La Valencia Beach Resort & Spa Los Cabos provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids' club and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Some rooms will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. At Villa La Valencia Beach Resort & Spa Los Cabos every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Cabo Real Golf Course is 2.1 km from the accommodation, while El Dorado Golf is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 23 km from Villa La Valencia Beach Resort & Spa Los Cabos.

name: Residences at Zadun a Ritz-Carlton Reserve
address: Boulevard Mar de Cortez, Puerto Los Cabo, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: The new residences are perfectly positioned on the sprawling 20,000 acres within Zadún, a Ritz-Carlton Reserve. With breathtaking views of the Sea of Cortés, the residences pay homage to Mexican haciendas, showcasing works from local artisans and offering a courtyard symbolizing the gathering spaces where conversations would flow between family and friends.Paying homage to the beauty, culture and heritage of Los Cabos, each home is designed with stunning views and distinctive modern architecture. Nestled in one of the most treasured corners of the world, homeownership privileges include exclusive access to a world-class marina, Jack Nicklaus and Greg Norman signature golf courses, a private beach, a 12-acre botanical park, an Owners’ lounge, in-residence dining and a la carte services from the ultra-luxurious Zadún, a Ritz-Carlton Reserve.Marriott

name: Real de Minas San Miguel de Allende
address: Ancha de San Antonio No. 1, Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Situated in the beautiful city of San Miguel Allende, this hotel features fitness centre and massage service. A spa and wellness centre is available. Hotel Real de Minas features many on-site recreational activities and facilities. Guests can enjoy billiards, tennis court and a spacious outdoor swimming pool. The hotel also features a special children's play area. The historic city of Virreinato is located only a short distance from the Hotel de Minas. Guests can discover beautiful architecture, stunning temples and churches as well as Baroque-style streets. The hotel is 850 metres from the San Miguel Arcángel Church and the History Museum. You can drive to León Airport in 1 hour and 40 minutes, and Querétaro Airport is 1.5 hours' drive away.

name: Live Aqua San Miguel De Allende Urban Resort
address: Calzada de la Presa No. 85, Zona Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Live Aqua is the luxury lifestyle brand with an exclusive concept that entices you to enjoy the pleasure of the senses in sophisticated and alluring atmospheres of dreamlike destinations. Live Aqua was created by pleasure-seekers who find inspiration in art, design and subtle details that fit their unique lifestyle. At Live Aqua, every day is an experience of endless sensations where you have the freedom to be yourself. Every space tempts and stimulates your senses with aromas, textures, flavors and sounds. Here, your desires are taken into consideration to assure your experience is pleasurable. Feel the feeling of Live Aqua.Please be advised that from March 14 2019, a 10% service charge resort fee will be charge per room per night.To our guests, we inform you that: outside visitors, such as makeup artists, stylists, photographers, etc; are not allowed into any of the exclusive guest areas, including the rooms. Available adult extra with additional cost.Please be advised that the following hotel services are with extra charge: parking and transportation. We appreciate your understanding. Please be advised that our that our wood esplanade will be under renovation from February 7th to March 14th. The noise will be less because it is far from the rooms, no service will be limited or affected. We appreciate your understanding.iHotelier/iStay

name: Sheraton Buganvilias Resort and Convention Center
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Ascencio No. 999, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Effortless and elevated, our newly renovated Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center is a smart way to stay in stunning Jalisco, Mexico. Thrive in our beachfront location close to the city and less than a quarter mile from downtown shops and restaurants at Malecon Boardwalk and 4.1 miles from Gustavo Diaz Ordaz International Airport. Relax in a Puerto Vallarta hotel room or suite with luxury bedding, marble bathrooms, flat-screen TVs, room service and oceanfront views. Recharge with our wide variety of renovated restaurants and keep moving with our four tennis courts, two outdoor pools, swim-up bar and 24-hour Sheraton Fitness center. When it's time to pamper, book our blissful Maiavé Village spa. Families with children appreciate Sheratoons, providing the little ones with fun and engaging activities. For business travelers, we offer streamlined event spaces and Puerto Vallarta packages for groups. Experience Jalisco, Mexico, the right way at Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center.Marriott

name: Now Amber Puerto Vallarta Resort & Spa
address: David Alfaro Siqueiros No.164-A Lote B, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: No description found

name: Plaza Pelicanos Grand Beach Resort
address: Jose Clemente Orozco 131, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: No description found

name: Marriott Puerto Vallarta Resort & Spa
address: Paseo La Marina Norte 435, Marina Vallarta, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Travel your own way at Marriott Puerto Vallarta Resort and Spa. Located steps from one of the most beautiful beaches in Jalisco Mexico our oceanfront resort pampers you with a stunning infinity pool diverse restaurants and the exquisite Ohtli Spa. Allow our Tequila Casamagna to add a little Mexican spark to your lounging experience. Our resort is near downtown Puerto Vallarta as well as Malecon Puerto Vallarta and Galeria Vallarta Mall. You and your loved ones will have plenty to do while at the resort. All rooms and suites come with a balcony or terrace so your will never be far from an incredible view. You will also have a cozy pillowtop mattress to lie on Netflix availability through your flat panel TV and complimentary robes to lounge in. We offer 15 venues indoors and outdoors for special occasions such as an LGTB wedding. Be sure to inquire about our exclusive packages when booking to enjoy unique perks and upgrades. Let Marriott Puerto Vallarta Resort and Spa ensure an inviting and exciting MexicoMarriott

name: The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta
address: Paseo De La Marina Sur 205, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Find your balance among 14 acres of swaying palm trees and fronted by a 410-foot private beach on the Pacific Ocean. The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta offers all this splendor only five minutes from Licenciado Gustavo Díaz Ordaz International Airport and charming downtown Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. Lace up for dining and upscale shops at the marina district across the road. Relax at a beachfront pergola and sparkling pool or book an appointment at our serene spa offering head-to-toe pampering. Our Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, resort hotel features a Westin WORKOUT® Fitness Studio, tennis courts and nearby golf courses. Bright colors and tropical Mexican décor grace every ocean-view hotel room at our resort, and each accommodation includes a private balcony, plush Heavenly® Bed and rejuvenating Heavenly® Bath. Recharge the right way at The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta.Marriott

name: Melia Puerto Vallarta
address: Paseo De La Marina Sur Lot H-7, 48335 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: This property is located Puerto Vallarta International Airport 6 km away from Puerto Vallarta city center, 8 km away from an eco park, and 3 km away from Puerto Vallarta International Airport. Facilities and services include 24-hour reception, air conditioning, balcony, bar, ATM machine on-site, concierge, dry cleaning (extra charge), elevator, garden, gym, laundry facilities (extra charge), outdoor pool, restaurant, safe, and spa facilities. Rooms feature air conditioning, bath and shower, hairdryer, towels, balcony, safe, television, mini bar, and telephone. Address: Paseo de la Marina Sur 7, 48354, Puerto Vallarta, JAL, Mexico.WebBeds

name: Casa Bonita Hotel & Luxury Residence
address: Calle Catalina 102, 68020 Oaxaca, Oaxaca
description: This stylish hotel is located 10 minutes’ drive from Oaxaca city centre and Santo Domingo Temple. It offers a swimming pool and an on-site night club and karaoke bar. The rooms at Hotel Casa Bonita are spacious and have traditional décor. They feature a safety deposit box, minibar and private bathroom. El Cielo restaurant serves regional and international cuisine in an elegant indoor area overlooking the garden. There is a terrace where guests can relax while having a coffee. It offers a complimentary Continental breakfast that can be upgraded to American for an extra fee. The "Estrella de Mar" restaurant is open from 7:30 until 11:00. Room service is available from both restaurants. The concierge service at Casa Bonita can arrange sightseeing tours of the city and main archaeological sites. Free round-trip shuttle to the city centre is provided. Main cultural attractions can also be reached from the hotel. Santa Maria del Tule Tree, one of the oldest trees in the world is just 10 minutes’ drive away. Xoxocotlán International Airport is about 35 minutes’ drive away.

name: Marriott Tuxtla Gutierrez Hotel
address: Boulevard Dr. Belisario Domínguez 1195, 29060 Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas
description: Embark on a journey of comfort and intrigue during your stay at Marriott Tuxtla Gutierrez Hotel in Chiapas, Mexico. Just minutes from the downtown area, our hotel makes it easy to access Zona Dorada, San Cristobal and Plaza Crystal for shopping and the picturesque Sumidero Canyon for scenic dwelling. End a day of adventures in our contemporary rooms and suites, where high-speed Wi-Fi and flat-panel TVs keep you connected. Accommodations also include plush pillowtop beds, complimentary bottled water and room service. Guests traveling together can take advantage of our spacious suites with additional rooms and pullout sofas. Find your Zen at Oriental Spa and Hairdresser Beauty Liss, and sunbathe at one of our three scenic pools. Our fitness center and tennis court are perfect for keeping to your workout routine before powering back up with a meal from one of our two restaurants. Whether you're here for the beach or for business, Marriott Tuxtla Gutierrez Hotel will be the home base you need.Marriott

name: Grand Fiesta Americana Veracruz
address: Blvd Manuel Avila Camacho, 94299 Veracruz, Veracruz-Llave
description: Situated in a select area of Boca del Río, this luxurious hotel offers relaxing spa services and enjoyable on-site facilities, such as 2 gourmet restaurants, just minutes from the convention center. Rooms are air-conditioned and have a safety deposit box. All rooms also have private bathrooms. Grand Fiesta Americana Veracruz is beach-front and offers excellent views. Go swimming in the indoor or outdoor pools. After a busy day, aromatherapy treatment in the spa. Enjoy seafood, Italian at Arantzia Restaurant and Rosato Restaurant and have a drink at the snack bar and lobby bar. For casual dining in a vibrant atmosphere, stop by the hotel's cafe, where a daily continental breakfast is served.

name: Crowne Plaza Monterrey
address: Avenida Constitucion Oriente 300, 64000 Monterrey, Nuevo Leon
description: Located downtown, the Crowne Plaza® Monterrey provides its guests with a convenient location in the best area in town. Found near the main avenues such as Constitución and Morones Prieto, the hotel provides you with easy access to several cultural and toursits attractions.Either if you’re here on business or leisure, CONVEX and CINTERMEX convention centers are a short distance from the hotel. If you feel like discovering and enjoying Monterrey, a few minutes away from the hotel you will find the Contemporary Art Museum, the Mexican History Museum and the famous Macroplaza. Enjoy a day filled with entertainment at the Sesame Street themed park, enjoy a long walk at Paseo Santa Lucía or take a bike ride at Parque Fundidora.Try the delicious menu at our restaurant La Ventana or relax at the spa and the heated pool with an amazing crystal ceiling, which provides you with an amazing view of the sky. Other amenities include a tennis court, pool table, sauna and Fitness Center. The hotel offers free Internet access in all areas of the building.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Grand Isla Navidad Resort
address: Circuito de Los Marinos, 28830 Manzanillo, Colima
description: This luxury beachfront resort, in Barra de Navidad, features a golf course, gym, spa and 2 outdoor pools, one located on the 10th floor. There are tennis courts and on-site water sports facilities. Free WiFi is included in public areas. Spacious air-conditioned rooms have a terrace with ocean, pool or mountain views. There is a living room with a sofa, cable TV and coffee maker. Rooms have a ceiling fan and private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Grand Isla Navidad Golf & Spa Resort with Marina offers several bars and restaurants. Room service is also available. There is free on-site parking and the hotel has 24-hour reception, as well as a tour desk and concierge service.
